title: FLOAT System Terminal
subtitle: Feedback Loops of Affective Transformation
description: A speculative digital framework blending psychoanalytic theory, queer theory, computational concepts, and philosophical frameworks. It serves as both a personal knowledge management system and a conceptual exploration tool.

corePrinciples.title: Shacks not Cathedrals
corePrinciples.description: Choose lightweight, adaptable cognitive structures over rigid complex systems

corePrinciples.title: Emotional Resonance as Data
corePrinciples.description: Truth is validated through affective resonance

systemInfo.welcome: Welcome to FLOAT... YOU ARE THE THREAD NOW
